Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27842 affecting package openjpeg2 for versions less than 2.3.1-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-27842 affecting package openjpeg2 for versions less than 2.3.1-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openjpeg2 is earlier than 2.3.1-12, affected by CVE-2020-27842
